title: The Guru Delivery
description: Gurus are usually found in the most unexpected places at the most unexpected times. Khris discovers his in an oddly dressed hitchhiker, Matt, who seemingly has no particular destination in mind. Though hesitant at first, Khris begins to gain trust in his new guru as he navigates him past some of the road blocks in life that have caused him to give up hope that there is something more.
author: Douglas Albert Boter
